import React, { useState } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import icon from "../img/user.png"; import { logout } from "../actions/auth"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Alert from "../actions/alert"; import Auth from "../actions/auth"; const AddProducts = ( { auth: { user } }, { setAlert, register, isAuthenticated } ) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ product_name: "", product_short_desc: "", taq: "", maq: "", product_img:"", top:"", price:"", sp_price:"", big_desc:"", }); const { product_name, product_short_desc, taq, maq,product_img,top,price,sp_price,big_desc } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (

); }; AddProducts.propTypes = { auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired, }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ auth: state.auth, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(AddProducts);
